summary: Summon a Dremora Mage from Oblivion to help you!
descriptionHtml:
[size=10]New Summon[/size]
The Dremora Lord is one of the mos powerful summons in Skyrim, but i always wanted an alternative summon, not a heavy-armored warrior or those funny atronachs. So i made this mod, for me and for anyone to use, a powerful Dremora Mage to fight with Arch-Mage Dragonborn!

Using Black Robes and a pair of boots, he can take down some of the most annoying enemies for you only with magic.

The Dremora Mage has less health and stamina than Dremora Lord, but he only have ranged attacks and can heal himself if he is near death. I tried to do not make him overpowered and a mage version of Dremora Lord.

[size=10]Overpowered[/size]
I was asked to make a hardcore version of Dremora Mage to those who play in extreme difficulties. I do not like god-like mods, but if you are a hardcore player, this will help. Dremora Mage OP is much more powerful than the default, he has a stronger version of Incinerate, can turn greater undead, can heal more health and conjure a Storm Atronach. He also has more Health, Magicka and Stamina.

[size=10]Stats[/size]

Health: 300 (450 OP)
Magicka: 500 (700 OP)
Stamina: 50 (150 OP)
Speed: Normal (130% OP)

[size=10]Spells[/size]
I wanted the Dremora Mage with some good magic, but not overpowered. So i gave him some basic and varied spells:

Incinerate: default ofensive spell, does great damage as the Dremora Mage is very skilled in Destruction. (Has 120 damage in OP version)
Flame Cloak: to burn near enemies.
Close Wounds: Dremora Mage use this when he is near death.
Greater Ward: magical protection against magic and weapons.
Ebonyflesh: best mage armor (300 armor rating).
Turn Undead: very helpful when fighting Draugr, Vampires and other abominations
Turn Greater Undead: can be used against more powerful undead (only in OP Version).
Grand Healing: heals much more health (only in OP version).
Conjure Storm Atronach: Dremora Mage is so overpowered that he can summon too! (only in OP version).

[size=10]Perks[/size]
Beyond the spells, Dremora Mage also has perks, here is the list:

Augmented Flames II (70): makes fire spells stronger
Destruction Expert (75): reduces Incineration's cost.
Restoration Adept (50): reduces Greater Ward and Close Wounds' cost.
Alteration Expert (75): reduces Ebonyflesh cost.
Mage Armor III (70): fortifies Ebonyflesh.
Stability (70): makes Ebonyflesh last longer.
Regeneration (20): fortifies Close Wounds.
Recovery II (60): recover magicka more faster. (only in OP version)
Aspect of Terror (50): makes fire spells stronger. (only in OP version)


[size=10]Video[/size]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XNTM5DP9n8Y

[size=10]Notes[/size]
*If you have any question, leave a comment and i shall reply.
*All Conjuration perks affects Dremora Mage, including Twin Souls.
*The spell tome can be bought from any magic merchant.
*Any bugs or errors contact me.

[size=10]Updates[/size]

1.1 fixed Conjuration level, now Dremora Mage will use Turn Undead.
